items.title: New York Times Trump op-ed denied by senior officials
items.description: There is huge speculation over who wrote a scathing anonymous newspaper piece about President Trump.
items.content: There is huge speculation over who wrote a scathing anonymous newspaper piece about President Trump.

items.title: World leaders back UK Novichok allegations
items.description: Russia accuses the UK of "hysteria" as Western powers say Russian state "almost certainly" behind attack.
items.content: Russia accuses the UK of "hysteria" as Western powers say Russian state "almost certainly" behind attack.

items.title: Burt Reynolds: Hollywood star dies, 82
items.description: The moustachioed megastar starred in Deliverance, Smokey and the Bandit, and The Cannonball Run.
items.content: The moustachioed megastar starred in Deliverance, Smokey and the Bandit, and The Cannonball Run.

items.title: Twitter bans Alex Jones and Infowars for abusive behaviour
items.description: Mr Jones is known for spreading conspiracy theories about Muslims, migrants and the Sandy Hook shooting.
items.content: Mr Jones is known for spreading conspiracy theories about Muslims, migrants and the Sandy Hook shooting.

items.title: Mexico violence: Remains of 166 found in Veracruz mass grave
items.description: The gruesome discovery was made in Veracruz state which has suffered years of drug-related violence.
items.content: The gruesome discovery was made in Veracruz state which has suffered years of drug-related violence.

items.title: Brazil politician Jair Bolsonaro stabbed in street
items.description: Controversial presidential candidate Jair Bolsonaro was attacked in the street while campaigning.
items.content: Controversial presidential candidate Jair Bolsonaro was attacked in the street while campaigning.

items.title: Basra protests: Iraq government buildings torched in new unrest
items.description: Demonstrators are angry over government corruption and a lack of basic public services.
items.content: Demonstrators are angry over government corruption and a lack of basic public services.

items.title: EU: 'Positive elements' in UK Brexit plan
items.description: The upbeat assessment comes after claims Michel Barnier called the UK plan "dead in the water".
items.content: The upbeat assessment comes after claims Michel Barnier called the UK plan "dead in the water".

items.title: Genoa bridge collapse: Italian prosecutors investigate 20 people
items.description: Prosecutors are considering charges of involuntary manslaughter over the disaster in Genoa, Italy.
items.content: Prosecutors are considering charges of involuntary manslaughter over the disaster in Genoa, Italy.

items.title: Brett Kavanaugh: Supreme Court pick 'questioned abortion ruling'
items.description: Emails suggest Brett Kavanaugh questioned whether a ruling legalising abortion was "settled law".
items.content: Emails suggest Brett Kavanaugh questioned whether a ruling legalising abortion was "settled law".
